People are a bit to emotional\, its not the worst movie ever made. It is however full of plot holes and twists that feels like they are there because writers could not agree or disney wanted to make more money\,

It also feels like a film created to sell toys\, there is a new ship here and a new ship there and since the BB-8 droid sold so well last time\, now there are more useless critters everywhere to turn into toys.

The bad guy we knew nothing of that came out of nowhere is also just kiled off as soon as he appeared~ish. 

The critics saw some other movie than the audience\, hope Disney wont listen to them when deciding how to make the next movie...

Probably even more new ships and critters that make no sense\, i know people with lightsaber whips... oh wait
